lines.text: let a be long long integer array with size n + 1
v is a vector of long long integers

for integer i = 0 to n exclusive

lines.text: push a [ i ] to the v

for i = 0 to length of v exclusive , increase sum by v [ i ]

lines.text: for j = 0 to length of v1 exclusive , increase sum by 1v [ i ]

lines.text: if v1 has odd amount of elements
